title: Cleave
content:
Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class an Equipment.

Cleave Information

Swing your weapon in a large arc to attack up to 3 enemies at once. Each take half the damage your weapon usually deals. Damage: 1/2 Normal Weapon Damage Slashing Type: Action 2m (Cone) Attack Roll Short Rest
